@param _cTokens address of conditional tokens contract to be used

documentation.text:
@dev reads the price of the token
@param makerPriceFeed address of relevant Maker DAO price feed. Defined at market preparation.

@dev resolves market by getting price from feed, comparing to target value and calling Conditional Tokens reportPayouts function with an array of uints representing payout numerators.
@param questionId used in market preparation
@dev Emitted upon the successful reporting of whether the actual value has exceeded target to the conditional tokens contract.
@param _cTokens address of conditional tokens contract to be used

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Please submit a resolution time in the future"

documentation.text:
@dev reads the price of the token
@param makerPriceFeed address of relevant Maker DAO price feed. Defined at market preparation.

@dev resolves market by getting price from feed, comparing to target value and calling Conditional Tokens reportPayouts function with an array of uints representing payout numerators.
@param questionId used in market preparation

params._cTokens: address of conditional tokens contract to be used

params.resolutionTime: timestamp of start of valid market resolution window
params.variation: To define a binary market set to 0. To define a scalar market set to desired plus and minus range. Bounds are equal to targetValue +- variation.

resolveMarket(bytes32).details: resolves market by getting price from feed, comparing to target value and calling Conditional Tokens reportPayouts function with an array of uints representing payout numerators.
